title: Proposal: Analyze Inbox Philosophical Texts for Decision-Making Biases

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Analyze inbox PDF documents (Cicero, Damasio, Aurelius) to identify potential biases or logical fallacies present in influential philosophical and strategic texts. Use AgentScholar and AgentCivics to digest and synthesize insights regarding the application of Stoic philosophy and emotion/reason dynamics within the Republic's decision-making processes.
